NightRoutine: Step 1: Gentle face wash (removes dirt and makeup) → Step 2: Serum/gel (targets skin concern) → Step 3: Moisturizer (locks hydration)

Products.name: Biotique Bio Neem Cleanser
Products.usage_note:

Products.name: Neutrogena Ultra Sheer SPF 50

• Ultra-sheer texture is perfect under makeup.
• Protects pores from UV damage that causes blackheads to darken.

Lemon Honey Mix — Ingredients: 1 tsp lemon + 1 tsp honey. Instructions: Apply 5 min, rinse.
Orange Peel Pack — Ingredients: 1 tbsp orange peel powder + yogurt. Instructions: Apply 10 min, rinse.

Cucumber Slices — Instructions: Place slices on skin for 10 min, rinse.
